mapper.sql: project_id, object_id, bidder_id, status, biddee_id, start_time, end_time
mapper.select: select project_id, object_id, bidder_id, a.status, biddee_id, start_time, end_time from t_gcgl_project a INNER JOIN t_qyzz_biddee b on a.biddee_id = b.id where a.object_id = #{objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and b.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.status = 'OK#'
mapper.insert: insert into t_gcgl_project (project_id, object_id, bidder_id, status, biddee_id, start_time, end_time) values (#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bidderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{biddeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE})

insert into t_gcgl_project
project_id,
object_id,

end_time,

mapper.update:
update t_gcgl_project
object_id = #{objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bidder_id = #{bidderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
biddee_id = #{biddeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=DATE},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE},
where project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_gcgl_project set object_id = #{objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bidder_id = #{bidderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, biddee_id = #{biddeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=DATE}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE} where project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
